author: MSNBC
title: Four dead in helicopter crash on Hawaii island of Kauai
description: Four people died in helicopter crash on the Hawaii island of Kauai on Tuesday, the Navy's Pacific Missile Range Facility said.
content:
Four people died in helicopter crash on the Hawaii island of Kauai on Tuesday, the Navy's Pacific Missile Range Facility said.
